div.div: Profiles define the criteria for acceptance of a set of documents.

tr.td: The document type : activity, organisation etc.
An html fragment to describe the purpose of the profile.
the name of the ruleset to be used. The root of the rule set should be the same as the root of the profile
an integer 0 - 100. The document set as a whole will pass if the percentage of documents satisfying all the rules in this ruleset is equal to or exceeds this threshold
the threshold for this individual rule. By default this is 100

ul.li: The acceptance of the ruleset as a whole should be affected by the specific rules but at present it does not. It should because one use of the individual rules is to remove a specific rule by setting its threshold to zero

Currently rules are only pass/fail - a rule which is not applied either because there are no hits on the rule or because the precondition of a rule fails, are counted as passes. Really need to move to a tri-state logic - pass/fail/not applicable
Error report contains only errors but we need sucesses to in order to produce a meaningful report
Profile analysis page includes all the rules in the profile - should optionally show only the failed rules
Only the sample activities are analysed - activity set selection to be added
